coreAtributes.name: Greaves
coreAtributes.description: A set of armoured plates to bedeck the thighs, and protect them from blades and points. Comes with a layer of mail, as well.

displacementText.playerSelf: You unstrap and remove your Greaves.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You tear [npc.name]'s Greaves from their thighs.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.name] tears your Greaves from your thighs.

replacementText.playerSelf: You strap your Greaves to your thighs.
replacementText.playerNPC: You strap [npc.name]'s Greaves to their thighs.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You slap [npc.name]'s Greaves to their thighs and strap them on.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.name] straps their Greaves onto their thighs.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.name] straps your Greaves to your thighs.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.name] slaps your Greaves to your thighs and straps them on.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.name] slaps [npc2.name]'s Greaves to their thighs and straps them on.
